alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Rensselaer; Northern Washington; Southern Washington; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 3:09PM EST until February 28 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Columbia, Dutchess, Rensselaer and Washington Counties of eastern New York. * WHEN...From 7 PM Monday to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates could approach 1 inch per hour Monday night into early Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Rensselaer; Northern Washington; Southern Washington; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Rensselaer
